description:
Take your squat, deadlife and box jump to the next level. These tights are made with Chakara® compression fabric to help you power through your workout. Flatlock seaming sides comfortably next to your skin and UPF50+ sun protection keeps you covered when you take your training outside.Made of compression stretch jersey with a soft feel.Fabric vary by colour, solids: 88% Supplex® nylon and 12% Lycra® spandex, heathers: 46% nylon, 42% polyester and 12% Lycra spandex.UPF 50+ fabric keeps you protected.High waist with wide waistband provides extra coverage and has a hidden key pocket.Power mesh inset panels in waist gives maximum support.Breathable Coolmax crotch gusset adds comfort.Flatlocked construction resists chafing.

        Sustainability








Bluesign











                      Bluesign® Approved Material
name: Prana Transform Leggings - Women's
